code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class GuessNumber extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.generateRandomNumber=()=>{const randomNum=Math.floor(Math.random()*100)+1;this.setState({targetNumber:randomNum});console.log("Secret number:",randomNum);};this.handleInput=e=>{const userGuess=parseInt(e.target.value,10);const{targetNumber}=this.state;if(isNaN(userGuess)){this.setState({message:''});return;}if(userGuess>targetNumber){this.setState({message:"le nombre est plus petit"});}else if(userGuess<targetNumber){this.setState({message:"le nombre est plus grand"});}else{this.setState({message:"c'est juste"});}};this.state={targetNumber:null,message:''};}componentDidMount(){this.generateRandomNumber();}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px',border:'1px solid #ccc'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Jeu du Nombre Myst\xE8re"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"guessInput",children:"Devinez le nombre (1-100) : "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"guessInput",onInput:this.handleInput,placeholder:"Entrez un nombre..."}),this.state.message]});}}export default GuessNumber;
